protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
description: February, 2012, based on RNAqueous May 29, 2008 protocol revision C, TURBO DNA-free June 9, 2009 protocol 1907M revision F, phenol/chloroform protocol (http://cshprotocols.cshlp.org/content/2010/6/pdb.prot5438.full), ethanol precipitation protocol (http://cshprotocols.cshlp.org/content/2010/6/pdb.prot5440.full)
affiliation: Institute of Evolutionary Biology (CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra)
manuscript_citation: Richter, Daniel J and Fozouni, Parinaz and Eisen, Michael and King, Nicole. Gene family innovation, conservation and loss on the animal stem lineage. 2018;7:e34226 https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.34226

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

collections.protocol_name: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates
collections.protocol_name_html: Transcriptome sequencing of 19 diverse species of choanoflagellates

guidelines: To avoid possible RNA degradation, try to work quickly in all steps.

components.data: Place elution solution in a dry bath at 70-80ºC
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place elution solution in a dry bath at 70-80ºC

components.data: Place pellet in a 50 mL conical tube on ice
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place pellet in a 50 mL conical tube on ice
Add lysis buffer

components.data: Pipette up and down 5 times to resuspend the pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipette up and down 5 times to resuspend the pellet
On ice, add more lysis buffer

components.data: Pipette up and down 20 times to fully resuspend/lyse pellet
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipette up and down 20 times to fully resuspend/lyse pellet
Transfer into two 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes

components.data: Take an aliquot from one tube and pipette onto a glass slide to check lysis
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take an aliquot from one tube and pipette onto a glass slide to check lysis

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: Keep the slide in a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.thread_text: Keep the slide in a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained
source_data.body: Keep the slide in a petri dish to ensure the noxious smell is contained

components.data: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at maximum speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC, 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Immediately centrifuge both tubes at maximum speed in a microcentrifuge at 1ºC, 5 min to pellet unlysed bacteria

components.data: During centrifugation, add a cover slip to the glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: During centrifugation, add a cover slip to the glass slide and quickly confirm lysis using a microscope.

components.data: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: On ice, pass the lysate in each tube 5 times through a 25 gauge needle fitted to an RNAse-free 1 mL syringe.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 11 of RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: If cells were not lysed, pass through the needle additional times, and re-check lysis before continuing.
source_data.thread_text: If cells were not lysed, pass through the needle additional times, and re-check lysis before continuing.
source_data.body: If cells were not lysed, pass through the needle additional times, and re-check lysis before continuing.

components.data: Add 64% EtOH at room temperature (RT) per tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 64% EtOH at room temperature (RT) per tube

components.data: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA

components.data: Mix thoroughly by inverting the tubes several times
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix thoroughly by inverting the tubes several times

components.data: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA

components.data: Transfer lysate/ethanol mixture from one of the Eppendorf tubes to a single filter cartridge in a collection tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer lysate/ethanol mixture from one of the Eppendorf tubes to a single filter cartridge in a collection tube

components.data: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA

components.data: Centrifuge at 15,000 xg, RT, 30 sec or until the mixture is drawm through the filter
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 15,000 xg, RT, 30 sec or until the mixture is drawm through the filter

components.data: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA

source_data.description: Discard the flow through

components.name: Section

source_data.section: Filter Binding, Washing and Elution of RNA

components.data: Repeat steps 15-17 three additional times until all of the lysate/ethanol mixture in both Eppendorf tubes has been drawn through the filter cartridge
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Repeat steps 15-17 three additional times until all of the lysate/ethanol mixture in both Eppendorf tubes has been drawn through the filter cartridge

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 30 of RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: Final volume of eluate should be ~45 uL
source_data.thread_text: Final volume of eluate should be ~45 uL
source_data.body: Final volume of eluate should be ~45 uL

components.data: Spec on NanoDrop and make a dilution at 1:5 (2 µl :8 µl) in a separate tube for PCR/Bioanalyzer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spec on NanoDrop and make a dilution at 1:5 (2 µl :8 µl) in a separate tube for PCR/Bioanalyzer

components.data: Take an aliquot of 1:5 dilution from previous step and dilute to 1 ng/µL in a seperate tube (for Bioanalyzer)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take an aliquot of 1:5 dilution from previous step and dilute to 1 ng/µL in a seperate tube (for Bioanalyzer)

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 32 of RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: If the concentration is >240 ng/uL (10ug/41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80C.
source_data.thread_text: If the concentration is >240 ng/uL (10ug/41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80C.
source_data.body: If the concentration is >240 ng/uL (10ug/41.5 uL), dilute an aliquot to 240 ng/uL in 41.5 uL and save remainder at -80C.

source_data.description: Add 10X TURBO DNAse buffer
Add TURBO DNAse and mix gently
Incubate at 37ºC for 30 min

components.data: Add water to bring volume to 400 µL
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add water to bring volume to 400 µL

components.data: Add 3 M sodium acetate at pH = 5.2 (final concentration 0.3 M)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 3 M sodium acetate at pH = 5.2 (final concentration 0.3 M)
Add phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol at pH = 8

components.data: Shake vigorously inside fume hood for 15 sec
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Shake vigorously inside fume hood for 15 sec

components.data: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 2 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 2 min

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 40 of RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.protocol_name_html: RNAqueous with DNAse Clean-up by Phenol:Chloroform
source_data.annotation: Check for insoluble precipitate, indicating the presence of potassium salts > 20 mM.
source_data.thread_text: Check for insoluble precipitate, indicating the presence of potassium salts > 20 mM.
source_data.body: Check for insoluble precipitate, indicating the presence of potassium salts > 20 mM.

components.data: Transfer the top/aqueous phase to a new tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the top/aqueous phase to a new tube
Add chloroform:isoamyl alcohol at pH = 8

components.data: Shake vigorously inside fume hood for 15 sec
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Shake vigorously inside fume hood for 15 sec

components.data: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 2 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 2 min

components.data: Transfer the top/aqueous phase to a new tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the top/aqueous phase to a new tube

components.data: Add GlycoBlue (final amount ~25 µg, working stock 15 µg/µL)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add GlycoBlue (final amount ~25 µg, working stock 15 µg/µL)
Add 100% EtOH
Shake vigorously to mix
Freeze overnight at -20ºC
Thaw

components.data: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 10 min
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at max speed in a microcentrifuge for 10 min

components.data: Decant ethanol, then remove residual with pipette.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Decant ethanol, then remove residual with pipette.
Wash with -20ºC 70% EtOH
Centrifuge for 5 min, 4ºC
Dry pellet and resuspend in water

components.data: Spec on NanoDrop and dilute RNA to 1 ng/µL in a seperate tube (for Bioanalyzer)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spec on NanoDrop and dilute RNA to 1 ng/µL in a seperate tube (for Bioanalyzer)

components.data: Add SUPERase-In (at 20 U / µl, final concentration 1 U / µl)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add SUPERase-In (at 20 U / µl, final concentration 1 U / µl)

components.data: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes. Otherwise, continue with the same tubes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If cells were lysed, transfer supernatant into two new 1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes. Otherwise, continue with the same tubes.
